ygData.subject: Re: Lake Rathetea
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I haven t seen this ring; however, I did see a post somewhere where someone was asking how to use a Ring of Running (which he had).  The response was
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I haven't seen this ring; however, I did see a post somewhere where
someone was asking how to use a Ring of Running (which he had). The
response was that it wasn't working yet (as in a bug/not implemented yet).
This sounds like it could be a SoW ring; however, again I have never seen
it, have no idea where to get it, and have heard it doesn't currently work.
Not very helpful, but it is all I know :( If anyone has any more
information I would love to hear about it also

-Azerin

>One last question. I need to find out if this is rumor or true. S O W
>rings(spirit of the wolf) do they realy exsist. Or is this just another
>rumor to make us lower levels drool. If any one knows anything on this I
>would like info. Being a necro with out doge to level 22, when a pet dies
>god you got be able to run. I hate it when your pet dies for a stupied
>resason and a blue uper hand kills you. Grrrr!!
